title: Etekcity® 2 port 1x2 Amplified HDMI Splitter ver1.3 - HDCP Audio Video Switch with 3D - 1080P HDMI - Support for PS3 XBOX360 DVD Blu-ray
description: This Etekcity® 2 port HDMI splitter distributes the HDMI input into corresponding synchronized outputs. Great for information distribution, conference room presentations, and school and corporate training environments.The HDMI Splitter functions both as a buffer and an amplifier. The series connection of this HDMI Splitter allows for long distance transmission of the HDMI signal over more than 15 meters. Two or more HDMI Splitters can be cascaded to increase distribution significantly.This HDMI Splitter also offers solutions for HDTV retail and show site, STB, DVD, and Projector Factory. Noise, space, and security concerns are easily managed with the data center control.Specifications:-HDMI Version: 1.3-Video Amplifier Bandwidth: 140 MHZ-Input Video Signal: 0.5-1.0 colts p-p-Input DDC Signal: 5 volts p-p (TTL)-Support resolution: Up to 1080p-Support Vedio Format: 640x480; 800x600; 1024x768; 1280x1024-DTV/HDTV: 480i/576i/480p/576p/720p/1080i/1080p-Output Video: HDMI+HDCP1.0/1.1-Vertical Frequency Range: 60 Hz-Power Supply: 5V DCPackage includes：1 x Etekcity® 2 Port HDMI Splitter1 x DC 5V/1A power adapter1 x User’s Manual
